Sam.description: Passionate about achieving a low-carbon future for everyone, Sam leads the devlopment of the MyBalance platform.

Rhys.description: Excited by the challenge of a low-carbon future and the innovations it will bring, Rhys designs and develops the MyBalance app and website.

Steve.description: A chartered surveyor with over 30 years of experience improving the energy performance of the built environment,
